headline: Brave Goggles landing page has explicit liberal bias
description:
If you go to the Brave Goggles landing page, it only shows the top 4 Goggles, which means it only shows "News from the Left" but it does not show the "News from the Right" option or any of the more centrist news options.

The landing page at issue:

https://search.brave.com/goggles

Here are some of the countervailing options that are not included in the landing page currently:

News from the Right: https://search.brave.com/goggles?goggles_id=https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Fallsides-news%2Fbrave-goggles%2Fmain%2Fright.goggles

More right-wing news: https://search.brave.com/goggles?goggles_id=https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Fbruh-source%2Fgoggles%2Fmain%2Freal_patriot_news

Media Bias Fact Check: https://search.brave.com/goggles?goggles_id=https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Fjps-yes%2Fmy_brave_goggles%2Fmain%2Fgoggles%2Fmediabiasfactcheck.goggle

Centrist News; disclosure, I work on this one: https://search.brave.com/goggles?goggles_id=https%253A%252F%252Fraw.githubusercontent.com%252Fpreambleai%252Fbrave-goggles%252Fmain%252Fcentrist-news&nav=site

No News: https://search.brave.com/goggles?goggles_id=https%3A%2F%2Fgist.githubusercontent.com%2Faxelknock%2Ff2b968901d2f7e9dfc4e3f675d14a323%2Fraw

My own personal political beliefs tend slightly more liberal, but I think conservatives have legitimate grievances about liberal bias in much of mainstream media, and in this case the bias is so overt that I don't think it's fair for the Goggles landing page to be so overtly biased as it is. I know Goggles is just a beta and I know this biased promotion of liberal politics was unintentional. I still hope they could fix it and wanted to make the Brave team aware if someone from Brave is reading this.
headline_zh-Hans: 勇敢的护目镜登陆页面有明确的自由主义偏见
headline_zh-Hant: 勇敢的護目鏡登陸頁面有明確的自由主義偏見
description_zh-Hans:
如果你进入Brave Goggles登陆页面，它只显示前4个Goggles，这意味着它只显示"来自左翼的新闻"，但它没有显示"来自右翼的新闻"选项或任何更中间的新闻选项。

有问题的登陆页面：

https://search.brave.com/goggles

以下是目前没有包括在登陆页面中的一些反面选项：

来自右翼的新闻：https://search。 brave.com/goggles?goggles_id=https%3A%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Fallsides-news%2Fbrave-goggles%2Fmain%2Fright.goggles

更多右翼新闻：https://search.brave.com/goggles?goggles_id=https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Fbruh-source%2Fgoggles%2Fmain%2Freal_patriot_news

媒体偏见事实调查：https://search.brave.com/goggles? goggles_id=https%3A%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Fjps-yes%2Fmy_brave_goggles%2Fmain%2Fgoggles%2Fmediabiasfactcheck.goggle

中心主义新闻；披露，我在这上面工作：https://search.brave.com/goggles?goggles_id=https%253A%252F%252Fraw.githubusercontent.com%252Fpreambleai%252Fbrave-goggles%252Fmain%252Fcentrist-news&nav=site

无新闻：https://search.brave.com/goggles? goggles_id=https%3A%2F%2Fgist.githubusercontent. com%2Faxelknock%2Ff2b968901d2f7e9dfc4e3f675d14a323%2Fraw

我个人的政治信仰略微倾向于自由派，但我认为保守派对主流媒体的大部分自由派偏见有合理的不满，在这种情况下，偏见是如此明显，我认为Goggles登陆页面如此明显的偏见是不公平的。 我知道Goggles只是一个测试版，我知道这种对自由主义政治的偏向性宣传是无意的。 我仍然希望他们能解决这个问题，如果Brave的人看到这篇文章，我想让Brave团队知道。
